0.title: Building
0.content: . | Clone EcoSim: git clone https://github.com/wheitman/ecosim | Download the Unity Hub and open it | In Unity Hub’s “Projects” tab, click “Add” -> “Add Project from Disk” | Select the root of the EcoSim repository | The Unity Hub will likely prompt you to install the Unity Editor. Select the version it recommends, v6000.0.40f1 (the minor version can vary). | Once the editor is installed, click the “ecosim” project to open it. | .

1.title: Home
1.content: EcoSim is a Unity-based farm robotics simulator.
